title: Navigating the Complexities of Crypto Custody: Insights from CCData’s Institutional Primer
description: A recent report by CCData, commissioned by Zodia Custody, offers an impartial look at the landscape of digital asset custody. Titled “Crypto Custody: An Institutional Primer,” the report focuses on the indispensable role custodians play in this rapidly evolving sector. It also delves into the challenges that institutions commonly encounter, factors for institutional integration, and […]

title: Bitfinex Securities to launch tokenized bond
description: The Bitfinex Securities platform is preparing to issue its first tokenized bonds in November.

title: Financial institutions inch towards crypto adoption
description: A panel of industry experts indicated growing, albeit cautious, adoption of cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology by mainstream financial institutions at the European Blockchain Convention on Wednesday.

title: Ripple announces new partnership with global Web3 platform Uphold
description: In a press release dated Oct. 24, Ripple, the blockchain-based digital payment network, announced its partnership with Uphold.

title: Bitcoin’s Rise Not Driven by ETF Hype, But by Global Military Expenditure
description: Artur Hayes said that the US’s military budget is set to explode amid the current Israel-Hamas conflict and will increase government borrowing placing upward price pressure on Bitcoin. Amid the current geopolitical development, Bitcoin shows good performance along with Gold. In a recent development, Arthur Hayes, the co-founder of the BitMEX derivatives exchange, shared an [...]

title: Unraveling the Coinbase-SEC Conundrum: A Battle Over Cryptocurrency Regulation
description: Coinbase challenges the SEC’s authority in an investment contract dispute. XRP lawyer John Deaton supports Coinbase, predicting a high chance of legal success. Coinbase’s Stance Against SEC’s Regulatory Expansion In the ongoing saga between Coinbase, a paramount player in the cryptocurrency exchange realm, and the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), the stakes are undeniably [...]

title: BTC’s Momentum Slows Following DTCC Delisting Announcement
description:
Most cryptocurrencies have started cooling down after a hot few days in the market. Bitcoin (BTC) is no exception, as its price only managed a slight 0.46% climb in its price over the past 24 hours of trading. BTC’s price pumped yesterday after the on-chain analytics platform, Lookonchain, revealed on X that the iShares spot […]

The post BTC’s Momentum Slows Following DTCC Delisting Announcement appeared first on Coin Edition.

title: Trader Who Called 2022 Crypto Bottom Warns Bitcoin (BTC) in Dangerous Territory Following Big Breakout
description:
A trader who rode the rally in the broader crypto markets earlier this year is warning that Bitcoin (BTC) is in a precarious position even after taking out resistance at $30,000. Pseudonymous trader DonAlt tells his 509,700 followers on the social media platform X that Bitcoin needs to end the week above the $32,290 price […]

The post Trader Who Called 2022 Crypto Bottom Warns Bitcoin (BTC) in Dangerous Territory Following Big Breakout appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
